channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-16541] Avoid unnecessary cell copy in Result#compareResults
item.description:
Bar.java

// Bytes.equals(a, b) should be replaced by Bytes.equals(a, off, len, b, off len);

  public static void compareResults(Result res1, Result res2)

      throws Exception {

    ...

    Cell[] ourKVs = res1.rawCells();

    Cell[] replicatedKVs = res2.rawCells();

    for (int i = 0; i < res1.size(); i++) {

      if (!ourKVs[i].equals(replicatedKVs[i]) ||

          !Bytes.equals(CellUtil.cloneValue(ourKVs[i]), CellUtil.cloneValue(replicatedKVs[i]))) {

        throw new Exception("This result was different: "

            + res1.toString() + " compared to " + res2.toString());

      }

    }

  }
item.summary: Avoid unnecessary cell copy in Result#compareResults

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
The Result.compareResults is used by VerifyReplication which compares the data from a local table with a remote one.

There are a lot of unnecessary copy if the tables are large.
include a trivial change in the hbase-server module for testing hbase-server

-1 overall
